name: Escape From Europa
description:
Fight three invading aliens on a spacemarine (space submarine) to escape the melting moon of Europa. Inspired by cheesy action flicks and made for GB Jam 8.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

J - Confirm / Interact / Use Ammo Stations

K - Shoot Harpoon

--

Made by:

Zach Melamed - Art

Bradley Lewis - Music

Kevin Apolis - Code

Soundtrack here!
